A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Definitely one of if not my favorite star wars movie. Saw it opening day and couldn't stop thinking about it so I'm seeing it again today. I saw absolutely nothing coming and loved the turns it took. True there is a slower section but I think the rest of the movie completely makes up for that one part. All in all its a new turn for the franchise with risks took in this movie but I think they pay off. Loved the direction a majority of characters took not really one I could complain about. Personally would definitely recommend it!
